snippet: The United States’ top representative to the Syrian opposition, Robert S. Ford, retired from the Foreign Service on Friday, the State Department said.
abstract: Robert S Ford, United States' top representative to the Syrian opposition, retires from the Foreign Service; acting deputy assistant secretary for Near Eastern affairs Lawrence Silverman will serve as his replacement until a successor is chosen.
lead_paragraph: The United States’ top representative to the Syrian opposition, Robert S. Ford, retired from the Foreign Service on Friday, the State Department said.

headline.main: American Envoy to Syria Steps Down
